description: Full results of the second stage of environmental checks carried out on the soil around the Grenfell Tower site between May 2020 and April 2021.

details.body:
1. Introduction

Environmental checks in and around Grenfell Tower were announced in October 2018. Stage 1, of a two-stage programme, was carried out over the spring and summer of 2019 and the full Stage 1 report was published in October 2019. Stage 1 informed the design of Stage 2 which involves more extensive soil sampling and analysis.

The initial results of Stage 2 were shared with residents. We have now published the full Stage 2 report, produced by the independent specialists, AECOM, on behalf of the Multi-Agency Partnership, which is responsible for overseeing the programme.

The full Stage 2 report provides a non-technical summary, a detailed technical report and appendices which provide detailed background information and all the data from the sampling.

2. Summary of report and next steps

Grenfell environmental checks - Stage 2 results - summary

PDF, 246 KB, 10 pages

3. Report documents

Stage 2 investigation: non-technical summary

PDF, 4.01 MB, 21 pages

Stage 2 investigation: full report

PDF, 6.9 MB, 174 pages

Appendices

  • Stage 2 investigation appendix A: figures (PDF, 7.68 MB, 25 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix B: tables (PDF, 354 KB, 32 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix C: data-gap assessments (PDF, 148 MB, 338 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix D: sampling procedures (PDF, 370 KB, 23 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix E: sample location figures (PDF, 8.61 MB, 48 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix F: field sampling notes and photologs (PDF, 83.8 MB, 475 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix G: lead concentration in soil figures (PDF, 12.8 MB, 50 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix H: benzo(a)pyrene concentration in soil figures (PDF, 12 MB, 49 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix I: asbestos identification in soil figures (PDF, 5.56 MB, 22 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix J: quantitative risk assessment (PDF, 2.83 MB, 296 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix K: laboratory information (PDF, 21.8 MB, 700 pages)
  • Stage 2 investigation appendix L: Envirocheck reports (PDF, 48.9 MB, 308 pages)

4. Public health advice

Information sheet: public health summary

PDF, 133 KB, 2 pages

5. Full sampling data

Full data set, and by location
